interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Bloomy Essentials Organic Eucalyptus Globulus Essential Oil 10 mL - USDA Certified Organic - Natural Aromatherapy for Clear Breathing, Mucus Relief, Nausea Relief and Stress Relief - 100% Pure Review Date: 2020/02/28 Store: Bloomy Essentials Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Bloomy Essentials', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus', 'Special Feature': 'Aromatherapy, Pure', 'Seasons': 'All Seasons', 'Item Volume': '10 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 1.6 x 1.6 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '680912084666', 'Manufacturer': 'Bloomy Essentials'} Review Text: I carefully compared this eucalyptus oil to one I already had, and I was surprised to notice a clear difference—this one smells better. I don’t really like the smell of eucalyptus—it’s great for cold relief and in cough drops to help clear your nasal passages, but not just to smell. But this one DOES clearly smell more pure than the one I already had. The other one I was comparing it to is only a couple of months old—so age is not the difference. This does seem to be better quality. I am honestly surprised to be reporting that, because I just didn’t think I would notice a difference.

If my review was helpful, please let Amazon know by clicking “helpful”. Thanks. Review Title: Better quality and more pure smelling than another one I have Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails, with Vitamin E and Panthenol, 6 Fluid Ounce Mountain Falls ["Don't wait for your next spa day to treat yourself. Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover has been carefully formulated to quickly and gently care for your nails. The salon quality formula softens cuticles and contains Vitamin E. Our formula is free of Parabens and Phthalates. Try Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover today."] {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Weight': '0.4 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '6 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 4 x 2 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Vi-Jon'} This nail polish remover works well. It doesn’t seem to dry my nails out. I appreciate that it is free of Parabens and Phthalates. But the advertised price is high in comparison to comparable nail polishes. Good nail polish remover. But pricey Bloomy Essentials Organic Eucalyptus Globulus Essential Oil 10 mL - USDA Certified Organic - Natural Aromatherapy for Clear Breathing, Mucus Relief, Nausea Relief and Stress Relief - 100% Pure Bloomy Essentials {'Brand': 'Bloomy Essentials', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus', 'Special Feature': 'Aromatherapy, Pure', 'Seasons': 'All Seasons', 'Item Volume': '10 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 1.6 x 1.6 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '680912084666', 'Manufacturer': 'Bloomy Essentials'} I carefully compared this eucalyptus oil to one I already had, and I was surprised to notice a clear difference—this one smells better. I don’t really like the smell of eucalyptus—it’s great for cold relief and in cough drops to help clear your nasal passages, but not just to smell. But this one DOES clearly smell more pure than the one I already had. The other one I was comparing it to is only a couple of months old—so age is not the difference. This does seem to be better quality. I am honestly surprised to be reporting that, because I just didn’t think I would notice a difference.

If my review was helpful, please let Amazon know by clicking “helpful”. Thanks. Better quality and more pure smelling than another one I have
profile:
**User Profile Summary**

- **Product Type Preference:** The user continues to prefer beauty and personal care products, particularly those related to nail care, while also demonstrating an interest in natural aromatherapy products.
- **Key Ingredients:** Values formulations with beneficial ingredients such as Vitamin E and Panthenol, as well as pure and organic components, indicating a commitment to nourishing and health-conscious choices.
- **Formulation Concerns:** Shows a consistent preference for products that are free from harmful chemicals such as Parabens and Phthalates, reflecting a strong awareness of health and safety in personal care items.
- **Performance Expectations:** Expects high efficacy in products and has begun to appreciate the quality indicators in essential oils, underscoring the importance of functionality and sensory experience.
- **Price Sensitivity:** Remains price-sensitive and seeks value-for-money solutions in beauty products and aromatherapy, indicating a desire for quality at a reasonable cost.
- **Rating Behavior:** Generally rates products positively when they meet or exceed expectations, as demonstrated in a recent purchase where quality differentiation led to a high rating, even for a previously unpreferred scent.

Overall, this user is health-conscious, values high-quality and organic personal care items, and seeks effective, cost-conscious solutions across both beauty and wellness products.
